Package java_source_code_management_tool.util

Class JavaFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java_source_code_management_tool.util.JavaFormatter
  • public class JavaFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class consists of helper methods that operate on or return Java code.
    Author:
    Jordan and Yanis (Group 4 - Pair 10)

      • deleteCommentsOrJavadoc

        public static java.lang.String deleteCommentsOrJavadoc​(java.lang.String content,
                                                       int commentTypeToDelete)
        Returns the specified Java code with the specified type of comment being deleted.
        Parameters:
        content - the Java code to operate on.
        commentTypeToDelete - the type of comment to delete (0: comments / 1: Javadoc).
        Returns:
        the Java code with the specified type of comment being deleted.

      • indent

        public static java.lang.String indent​(java.lang.String content)
        Returns the specified Java code with the code being indented.
        Parameters:
        content - the Java code to operate on.
        Returns:
        the Java code with the code being indented.

      • isBetweenQuotesOrCommentsAt

        public static boolean isBetweenQuotesOrCommentsAt​(int index,
                                                  java.lang.String content)
        Returns if the specified index is between quotes or in a comment in the specified content.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the char to look for.
        content - the content from which the index is processed.
        Returns:
        if the specified index is between quotes or in a comment in the specified content.

      • indexOutsideQuotesAndCommentsOf

        public static int indexOutsideQuotesAndCommentsOf​(java.lang.String str,
                                                  int fromIndex,
                                                  java.lang.String content)
        Returns the index within the specified content of the first occurrence of the specified substring being outside quotes and comments, starting at the specified index.
        Parameters:
        str - the substring to look for that is outside quotes and comments.
        fromIndex - the index from which to start the search.
        content - the content from which to do the search.
        Returns:
        the index within the specified content of the first occurrence of the specified substring being outside quotes and comments, starting at the specified index.
